name: yunohost
tagline: A server platform that simplifies self-hosting
description: YunoHost is a self-hosted server management platform aimed at making self-hosting simple. It offers a web admin panel and app catalog to install, configure, and update many services on a single box.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Install popular self-hosted applications with one click from a curated catalog of tested packages

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage server settings, users, domains, and applications through an intuitive web interface

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create accounts with email addresses and control access to installed applications per user

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Schedule regular backups of applications and data with easy restoration options

features.title: Email Server
features.description: Run a complete email stack with webmail, SMTP, IMAP, and spam filtering configured automatically
